name: YT Queue
description: Save and manage YouTube videos & playlists to watch later. Now with drag-and-drop reordering, tagging system, and Netflix-style position saving!

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https://img.youtube.com data:; connect-src 'self' https://api.youtubemultidownloader.com https://noembed.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com;
